title: Hanging, "Water", 1926–59
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist (batik) on crepe (crepe created using 2 and 2 alternation of S and Z overtwist of wefts); lined with damasse (plain weave and 1/3 twill)
description: Underwater scene with high, pointed mounds, coral and fish in dark blue-green water. Narrow band of star-filled dark blue sky at the top. Fish scale patterned borders on four sides. Lined with peach colored damasse silk with offset rows of Chinese-style medallions.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, "Water", 1926–59. Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist (batik) on crepe (crepe created using 2 and 2 alternation of S and Z overtwist of wefts); lined with damasse (plain weave and 1/3 twill). 1977-112-2.
